title: Custom Network
oracles-staked-description: The amount of tokens locked by users to curate the network
open-bounties-description: Number of bounties available to work
total-bounties-description: Number of bounties in the network
network-create-warning: A fee of amount will be taken when the network is created.
network-amount-to-create: {{amount}} {{symbol}} will be taken from this {{totalAmount}} {{symbol}} locked when you create the network

network-bounty-hall.title: {{network}} Bounty hall
network-bounty-hall.description: A collection of the most recent bounties of {{network}} networks

cancelable-time.label: Cancelable Time
cancelable-time.description: After this time the network governor can cancel a stuck bounty. Min. {{min}}.

oracle-exchange-rate.label: Oracle Exchange Rate
oracle-exchange-rate.description: Exchange rate applied when locking or unlocking tokens into the network. Min. {{min}}.
oracle-exchange-rate.unable-to-change: Unable to change because there are {{amount}} {{symbol}} locked.

merger-fee.label: Merger Fee
merger-fee.description: Percentage of the bounty amount distributed to the wallet that closed the bounty. Max. {{max}}.

proposer-fee.label: Proposal Creator Fee
proposer-fee.description: Percentage of the bounty amount distributed to the wallet that created the accepted proposal. Max. {{max}}.

warning-connect-github: Github account is required for changes to my network page

hero.title: Networks
hero.explanatory-text: A list of all the networks using BEPRO network for their development

lock.title: Lock {{currency}}
lock.you-need-to-lock: To create a network you will need to lock {{creatorAmount}} {{currency}}

network-information.title: Network information
network-information.you-can-change: You can change this information later in your Network Settings page.

name.label: Display name
name.helper: This will be you network name, it also affects your query URL.
name.unavailable: This network name is not available. Please pick a different name.

colors.label: Colors
colors.similar-colors: These colors are very similar. Please pick a different color.

network-information.logo-helper: The logos must be in .svg format

colors.label: Network Colors
colors.similar-colors: These colors are very similar. Please pick a different color.

other-settings.title: Other Settings
other-settings.parameters-warning: Changing these parameters will launch a new transaction for each one.
other-settings.warning-registry: These values were chosen by the network registry and are subject to change
other-settings.warning-add-remove-allowed-tokens: If there is removal and addition of tokens, two transactions will be required

repositories.title: Add Repositories
repositories.give-access: Give access to the {{user}} as an org maintainer.
repositories.you-need-to-accept: You need to accept this so the bot can interact with the repositories.
repositories.label: Repositories
repositories.used-by-other-network: The highlighted repositories are already being used by another network.
repositories.has-bounties: The highlighted repositories already have bounties and can't be removed.
repositories.no-repositories-selected: No repositories selected. At least one repository is required.
repositories.user-permission-not-admin_one: Your permission level on this repository does not allow giving access.
repositories.user-permission-not-admin_other: Your permission level on these repositories does not allow giving access.
repositories.no-merge-commit-permission_one: Repository {{repos}} don't support "merge commits" merge type. Please, allow that in the repository settings.
repositories.no-merge-commit-permission_other: Repositories {{repos}} doesn't support "merge commits" merge type. Please, allow that in the repositories settings.
repositories.without-bot-collab_one: Repository {{repos}} don't have {{bot}} bot as collaborator. Please, remove the repository from the network and re-add it.
repositories.without-bot-collab_other: Repositories {{repos}} doesn't have {{bot}} bot as collaborator. Please, remove the repositories from the network and re-add them.

tokens-dropdown.label: Network Token address
tokens-dropdown.description: Add an ERC20 token to be used as network token.

token-deployed.title: Token Deployed
token-deployed.content: Check token address in the form

errors.lower-than-zero: Please provider a number greater than zero

deploy.title: Failed do deploy
deploy.content: Token supply exceeds Ethereum integer limit

address.label: Treasury Address
address.info: Not mandatory field, it can be blank if a treasury is not required.

cancel-fee.label: Cancel Fee
cancel-fee.description: Percentage of bounty amount charged when a bounty is canceled. Minimum {{min}} and Maximum {{max}}

close-fee.label: Close Fee
close-fee.description: Percentage of bounty amount charged when a bounty is closed. Minimum {{min}} and Maximum {{max}}

update-github-token.title: Update your Github Token
update-github-token.description: To create your custom network we need permission to access your repositories

deploy-nft-token.title: New NFT
deploy-nft-token.description: Deploy a New NFT Token for your network

messages.refresh-the-page: Refresh the page for the changes to take effect.

errors.images-too-big: Your images are too big, maximum 1MB for both files combined
errors.dispute-time: The time that proposals can be disputed. Min. {{min}} and Max. {{max}} seconds.
errors.percentage-for-dispute: Percentage needed for a proposal to be disputed by the community. Max. {{max}}%.
errors.redeem-time: The time after a bounty creation that it can be cancelled. Min. {{min}} and Max. {{max}} seconds.
errors.council-amount: The amount of {{token}} locked needed to be a curator. Min. {{min}} and Max. {{max}}.
errors.network-not-registered: This network has yet to be registered to be usable, please do so.
errors.failed-to-update-network-id: Failed to update network chain id
errors.you-dont-have-a-custom-network: You don't have a custom network created

allow-merge: Allow automatic merge of pull-request when bounty is distributed (by ticking this off this merging and closing of pull-requests will have to be made manually)
